text: Carlos Augusto dos Santos da Silva (born ), known as Kaká, is a Brazilian-born Italian futsal player who plays as a pivot for Fuorigrotta and the Italy national futsal team. ==Honours== ===Individual=== * Serie A top scorer (3): 2008-09, 2012-13, 2015-16 ==References== ==External links== *The Final Ball profile Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian men's futsal players Category:Italian men's futsal players
title: Kaká (futsal player)
